summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Block 1 of Pettit's University Addition, Block 1 of Shelton's Addition, Block 9 of Assessor's Plat of University Heights, and the unplatted property lying between the west line of Block 9, Assessor's Plat of University Heights and the alley west thereof, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-168 and 17-121, respectively.
